meaningMnemonic: A <radical>stone</radical> <radical>lantern</radical> is an excellent way to <kanji>sharpen</kanji> anything, even in the dark. Your knives, your forks, your spoons, and even your sword.
readingMnemonic: Why did you <kanji>sharpen</kanji> your blade? Because you are about to do battle with <reading>Ken</reading> (けん), the famous samurai warrior.
